content.text:
Here is my attempt at the task, wrapped in the specified output tags:

<OUTPUT_TEXT>
As an expert Customer Service Representative, my key responsibilities would include:

• Answering customer inquiries by phone, email, chat or in-person to provide information about the company's products and services
• Processing customer orders, returns, exchanges, and account cancellations 
• Listening to and documenting customer complaints, then working to resolve the issues or escalate them to the appropriate teams
• Maintaining a positive, friendly and professional demeanor at all times to deliver exceptional customer service
• Keeping accurate records of all customer interactions and transactions in the CRM system
• Identifying opportunities to upsell or cross-sell relevant products and services to customers
• Staying up-to-date on product information, service changes, and company policies to provide customers with accurate information
• Collaborating with other departments like sales, billing, shipping and technical support to efficiently resolve customer issues
</OUTPUT_TEXT>
